# GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterGroup | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterGroup ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterGroup)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterGroup 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterGroup

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterGroup#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterGroup
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterGroup#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterGroup#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterDetailGameCenterGroupLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterdetailgamecentergrouplinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterGroup#see-also)

### [Reading Game Center details](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-gameCenterGroup#Reading-Game-Center-details)

[`Read the state of Game Center for an app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-gamecenterdetail)Get Game Center detail information for an app.[`Read Game Center details`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_)Read a specific Game Center detail and related information.[`Read app versions for a Game Center detail`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-gamecenterappversions)Get a list of app versions for a Game Center detail.[`GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAppVersions`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-relationships-gamecenterappversions)[`Read the groups in a Game Center detail`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-gamecentergroup)Get a list of groups in a Game Center detail.[`Read the challenges for a Game Center detail`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-gamecenterchallenges)Get challenge information for a specific Game Center detail.[`Read challenge Ids for a Game Center detail`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-relationships-gamecenterchallenges)List all the challenge IDs for a specific Game Center detail.
